messages.content: Yes, I am based on OpenAI's technology, which includes GPT-4 capabilities. How can I assist you today?
write me a python program you can test

It seems like your message might not have come through completely. How can I assist you further? If you have any questions or need further clarification on the Python program, or if there's another topic or question you have in mind, feel free to let me know!
